term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dust collector in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: dust collector

item.text: A device for monitoring dust emissions. Also the equipment used to remove and collect dust from process exhaust gases; this may employ simply sedimentation (dustfall jars, coated slides, papers, etc.), inertial separation (cyclones, impactors, impingers, etc.), precipitation (thermal and electrostatic) or filtration.
